trans-unit.source: Represents the behavior of a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il comportamento di una proprietà di dipendenza.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> class with an array of attributes.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref> classe con una matrice di attributi.

trans-unit.source: Attributes applicable to the dependency property, such as <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Attributi applicabili alla proprietà di dipendenza, ad esempio <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationOptionAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions"> </xref> consentono di definire le proprietà di dipendenza associata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default value of the associated dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore predefinito della proprietà di dipendenza associata.

trans-unit.source: This property can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere un riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: An object representing the default value for this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che rappresenta il valore predefinito per questo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Il tentativo di impostare questa proprietà quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed*>è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array that contains all attributes.
trans-unit.target: Recupera una matrice che contiene tutti gli attributi.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains all attributes.
trans-unit.target: Matrice che contiene tutti gli attributi.

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of type that contains those attributes having type equal to attributeType.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di tipo che contiene gli attributi di tipo uguale a attributeType .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of attributes to return.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>di attributi da restituire.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An array of type that contains those attributes having type equal to attributeType.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo che contiene gli attributi di tipo uguale a attributeType .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.GetValueOverride"></xref> callback, a callback invoked immediately upon a call to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.GetValueOverride"> </xref> callback, richiamato immediatamente al momento della chiamata per il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*>metodo.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options*> is set to <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options*>è impostato su <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this option is set to <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se questa opzione è impostata su <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if set to <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> has been applied to a property resulting in the immutable state.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref> è stato applicato a una proprietà di uno stato non modificabile.

trans-unit.source: When the PropertyMetadata.IsSealed is equal to `true`, the following operations cause a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> to be raised: - Attempting to set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando IsSealed è uguale a `true`, le operazioni seguenti generano un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>da generare:: tentativo di impostare <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: - Attempting to set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Il tentativo di impostare <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Attempting to set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.SetValueOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Il tentativo di impostare <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.SetValueOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.SetValueOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Attempting to set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.GetValueOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Il tentativo di impostare <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.GetValueOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.GetValueOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> is immutable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref> non è modificabile; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides processing when this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> is applied to a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce elaborazione quando questo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref> viene applicato a una proprietà di dipendenza.

trans-unit.source: Sends notification that this metadata has been applied to a property, and the metadata is being sealed.
trans-unit.target: Invia notifica che questi metadati sono stato applicato a una proprietà, e i metadati sono sealed.

trans-unit.source: This routine is no-op in this implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questa routine viene eseguita alcuna operazione in questa implementazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to which this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> has been applied.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> ai quali questo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref> è stato applicato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> associated with this metadata if this instance is type-specific metadata.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>associata a questi metadati se i metadati specifici del tipo di questa istanza.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If this is default metadata, this value is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se si tratta di metadati predefinito, questo valore è un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the property which represents the option setting for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> associated to this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la proprietà che rappresenta l'impostazione dell'opzione per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> associate a questo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The possible values for this property are: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>
trans-unit.target: I valori possibili per questa proprietà sono:<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions>

trans-unit.source: The option setting for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> associated to this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione dell'opzione per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> associate a questo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Il tentativo di impostare questa proprietà quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed*>è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed*>

trans-unit.target: Tentativo di impostare questa proprietà quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed*>è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.IsSealed*>
